name: Space Marble (Demo)
description:
Enter a mystical and enchanted world.  

Find the columns and activate the cosmic diamonds. For this you need to guide the sphere through narrow paths, mobile platforms and even ramps! You will need a lot of skill to keep the sphere from falling and thus complete all the courses. 

----------------------------------------------------------

Try the demo version (playing in the browser).

----------------------------------------------------------

   This is a game  (for now) just for Android. Soon there will be versions for Windows, Linux and iOS. Below you can find the link to download both versions (demo and full) on Google Play.

Link to the DEMO version:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=foostackers.demo.spacemarble

Link to the FULL version:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.fstackers.spacemarble

Comments and feedbacks are welcome. 

Hope you like it!

-----------------------------------------------------------

Tips

  • Play in full screen
  • Do not click on the Google Play links within the browser version of the game. Doing so it will crash. These links only work in the Android app.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Known issues

In the online version there are some glitches on the floor of "Tutorial Stage 2". I don't know why this is happening but I'm trying to correct it.

If you discover any other bugs please notify me. 

Thanks!
